rows.label: qev087407_MSG0011
rows.name: No parts, not enough manpower either......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0012
rows.name:
If only I could borrow the Commander's wisdom
to break through this situation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0001
rows.name:
Commander Vandham possesses such deep knowledge as a mechanic
that it impresses even us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0002
rows.name:
His advice saved my mechanic buddy Byron and me on
more than one occasion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0003
rows.name:
He really is a wonderful Commander, isn't he?
Don't you[ST:wide ]— think so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0005
rows.name:
As for Commander Vandham,
he left a message saying, "I'll show you how I work at night too, so find me,"
and left, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0006
rows.name: Where on earth did he go, I wonder?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087407_MSG0007
rows.name:
He headed towards the upper level of the BLADE Area,
so I think he's around there somewhere.[ST:wait ]
